title: UX Design for the Apple Car
caption: Industry research and branding to create a concept exploring evolved experiences for next-gen electric vehicles

title: Rethinking Physical Car Controls
caption: Exploring ways to reintroduce physical controls to the touchscreen interactions which currently dominate the vehicle dashboard landscape

title: Innovating Typeface Design
caption: Creating a concept for an AI-driven design app, and exploring how AI features are visually incorporated into complex interfaces, to streamline the design process of typography

title: A More Comfortable Approach to Tattooing
caption: Designing a quasi-social platform for tattoo artists and enthusiasts, especially first-timers, with a tailored visual design language and information architecture

title: Beer Labels Based on Movies
caption: Applying UX research principals to product packaging to start a personal project for graphic design based on the movies I'm watching
